attributes.action: reconsider the decision to remove British Forces Post Offices from mainland europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Armed Forces have been advised that the BFPO facilities in mainland europe will be shut from September 2010.  Personnel, and their families, deployed in europe currently enjoy the same postal rates as the UK. Withdrawal of this long established tradition will further erode personnel's ability to communicate with their families in the UK and safe receipt of parcels etc through a secure network.
